mahanare wrote:
> 
> 
> Hi all
> 
> I want to know the exact procedure of testing an ejb.
> suppose if i want to write a simple session bean and deploy it on
> jboss and then want to test the functionality.
> 
> then how do i go ahead?

You need an EJB client. Use your test. Just connect to the JBoss JNDI 
directory, lookup the EJB and use it. To do this, you'll need to run 
your tests in JBoss. Try the Cactus project.

There are better ways, but it's tough to write about them in this small 
space. The books _JUnit Recipes_ and _JUnit in Action_ can tell you more.
